title: 1.FC Union Berlin - Staff | Transfermarkt
snippet: Trainer, Manager und Co.: Diese Statistik listet alle Mitarbeiter, gegliedert nach ihrer Funktion, von dem Verein Union Berlin auf, die aktuell für den Verein arbeiten.

title: 2023–24 1. FC Union Berlin season
snippet: The 2023–24 season for 1. FC Union Berlin began under head coach Urs Fischer with a core coaching team that included assistant coach Markus Hoffmann, who focused on tactical preparation and training sessions.

title: 1.FC Union Berlin - Current and former staff | Transfermarkt
snippet: The record of current and former staff lists all coaches, presidents, athletic directors, etc. who have ever worked for the selected club, along. Under "Position", you can select a specific role from the drop-down menu. 2023-07-012023-02-012019-07-012018-11-012018-07-012018-07-012018-02-152011-08-03

title: Steffen Baumgart is Union's New Head Coach | 1. FC Union Berlin
snippet: 1. FC Union Berlin have signed up Steffen Baumgart as new head coach for the men's professional team. The 52-year-old will prepare the team for the rest of the Bundesliga season from 2 January.

title: How Union's co-coaching team collaborates | 1. FC Union Berlin
snippet: Those who currently observe the training of the professional men's team of 1. FC Union Berlin quickly notice: On the sidelines stands not only head coach Steffen Baumgart. Four assistant coaches accompany the daily work – with different tasks, characters, and competencies, but with a common goal:
